name: Juice Grinder Recipe File
summary: Recipe file created by Juice Grinder, a program used to create and save eJuice recipes for personal vaporizers; contains a recipe calculated from information in the Juice Grinder .DEFT file; includes flavor, nicotine, PG, and VG ingredients; can be exported as a .PDF , .CSV , and .XLSX file.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
